oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1949-07-02 (bad take)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Bad take intended for broadcast Saturday July 2, 1949 at 11:30 am (see TR001401_1). Featuring (verbally identified) band members Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler, Tiny, and Earl (presumably Gulley). Announcer unknown. Sponsored by Bill's Auto Service and Ray's Auto Parts.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Announcer opening statement -- The Pale Horse And His Rider -- Bill's Auto Service commercial -- Announcer introduces Tiny -- Pretty Little Rainbow -- Announcer introduces Deacon -- Have You Ever Been Lonely? -- Ray's Auto Parts commercial -- Announcer introduces the Earl -- Beer Barrel Polka -- Theme -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
